entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:47 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 07:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -26.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -31.5°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
